short_summary: REPLACEMENT OF AC CONTROLS CONTROLLERS FOR THE QUEBEC RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT CENTRE
description: Replacement of AC controllers for the Quebec Research and Development Centre. Notice of Apparent Successful Bidder. Teleordering of contracts or transfer of existing contracts to a pre-identified Supplier. To Fix defects on the space conditioning system that serves the building at the Quebec R&D Centre.
tags: Air conditioning installation or maintenance or repair services
full_summary:
**Canada Tender Announcement**
================

**Technical Summary**
-------------------

The government of Canada through Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) is soliciting a proposal for the replacement of obsolete AC controls controllers at the Quebec Research and Development Centre.

**Description of the Work**
-------------------------

The project involves replacing the existing Reliable Controls controllers with new ones due to their obsolescence and the unavailability of replacement parts.

**Required Skills and Experience**
--------------------------------

The successful supplier must demonstrate capabilities in the following areas:

*   Be a dealer in Quebec for Reliable Controls products.
*   Personnel must be trained and qualified to install, maintain, and service Reliable Controls products, hardware, software, and BACnet products.

**Contract Period and Estimated Value**
--------------------------------------

The contract period shall be from the date of contract award until August 31, 2023. The estimated value of the contract is CAD 40,616.96 (excluding tax).

**Proposal Submission Requirements**
---------------------------------

Suppliers interested in the project must submit a Statement of Capabilities by the closing date to demonstrate their compliance with the above requirements. If no compliant proposal is received, the contracting officer may proceed with awarding the contract to the pre-identified supplier.

**Contact Details**
-------------------

To obtain additional information or to submit a proposal, please contact Claudia Lauzier at claudia.lauzier@agr.gc.ca or (438) 455-2392.

**Additional Resources**
-------------------------

The tender documents can be downloaded from the following link: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5640/acan-01b46-23-017.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5640/acan-01b46-23-017.pdf)
